AR https://dl.dropbox.com/u/14570796/Images/flagArgentina.jpg Currency: Peso Argentina is the second largest country in South America, after Brazil. It is constituted as a federation of 23 provinces and an autonomous city, Buenos Aires. It is the eighth-largest country in the world by land area and the largest among Spanish-speaking nations, though Mexico, Colombia and Spain are more populous. Pereli Rubber Company made the sole gas mask Manufactured in Argentina.

Unknown Unknown Pereli Gas Mask Pereli Gas Mask c. mid 1930s Scarce Argentina Military/Civilian AR-001 AR-001 https://dl.dropbox.com/u/14570796/Images/AR-001.jpg ? $200+ This mask, made by Pirelli Rubber of Italy, was either manufactured by a facility in Argentina or exported and used in Argentina during WWII. It features a long breathing tube and a large heavy filter canister. Circular exhale valves are also present on the sides of the mask. The face piece design is similar to the AGM style masks used in Italy and Belgium during WWII. This mask is now quite difficult to find on the collectors market.
